forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
The sun casts a gentle warmth over Downtown San Francisco, its golden rays softening the edges of the city’s iconic silhouette. As the day slowly retreats, the temperature hovers around a mild 67 degrees, promising a soothing transition into the evening. The winds dance lightly, blowing west-southwest at about 14 mph, adding a playful chill that whispers through the streets, reminding one of the ocean's presence not far beyond the hills. 

As night approaches, the sky will don a cloak of partly cloudy hues, where a comforting low of 56 degrees awaits those who wander out into the evening air. The marine layer, though perhaps shy today, keeps its distance, allowing for a clearer view of the horizon. For an urban stroll or a quiet dinner along the bay, light layers are advisable—perhaps a soft cardigan or a light jacket to wrap around against the cooling breeze. With enchanting views to savor and the gentle buzz of evening life unfolding, tonight beckons with the promise of serene moments under San Francisco’s twinkling stars.
